title: Pok Pok Playroom iOS app for kids launches ‘Shops’ toy for imaginative storytelling fun
content:
After launching a slick music sequencer back in March and Earth Day content in April, Pok Pok Playroom has received another update that adds a brand new toy. “Shops” is now available which offers fun open-ended play while encouraging growth with storytelling, imagination, planning, cause and effect, number sense, and much more.

more…
